subject: re:Can't afford medications you need?
body:
Dear customer.
USA Web pharmacies are too expensive, Mexican Web pharmacies sell fake medications so what should we do in order to save some money without risking our health? Choose Canadian quality.
At CanadianPharmacy you will be able to find all the drugs you shop for in your USA pharmacy. The only difference is that our drugs are 100% generic and are sold at a much lower price. CanadianPharmacy save together with our discount Canadian Web pharmacy.
CanadianPharmacy the best that modern medicine can offer you, plus the best Canadian prices.
Sincerely yours,Elmer Ervin
